connectToRepos

public void connectToRepos()
                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                           java.rmi.AccessException,
                           java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           java.rmi.NotBoundException
Establishes a connection to the model repository application. This application might be locally or remotely available. To which model repository this methods tries to connect can be configured in the configuration files for the model manager application.

Specified by:
connectToRepos in interface MmCoreService
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException
java.rmi.NotBoundException
java.rmi.RemoteException
java.rmi.AccessException
org.eodisp.util.configuration.ConfigurationException

isReposConnected

public boolean isReposConnected()
Tests if a connection to the model repository application is already established.

Specified by:
isReposConnected in interface MmCoreService
Returns:
true, if a connection is established, otherwise false.
